pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Transcription discs of Shubert productions, mostly operettas, broadcast on WGN, Chicago, 1944-1954, for Chicago Theatre of the Air, The Railroad Hour, The Celanese Hour and Texaco Star Theatre. Collection also includes cassettes of productions of "The Student Prince" (remastered from discs) that aired on the Texaco Star Theatre, July 21, 1946 and The Celanese Hour, May 24, 1945. Also radio commercials advertising Broadway shows in Shubert houses.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: Equipment is not available to listen to the discs.
